SELECT sino, sititle title, NVL( (SELECT count(DISTINCT sq_sino) FROM survey, surveyQuest, member WHERE sv_sqno = sqno AND smno = mno AND id = #{id} GROUP BY sq_sino HAVING sq_sino = sino), 0) cnt FROM surveyinfo WHERE sysdate BETWEEN sistart AND siend
SELECT sino, sititle title FROM surveyinfo WHERE siend < sysdate

SELECT sqno, sqbody body, NVL(squpno, sqno) upno FROM surveyQuest WHERE sq_sino = #{sino} START WITH squpno IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR sqno = squpno ORDER SIBLINGS BY sqno
